Analytics Edge - EdX

Analytics Edge - EdX

omotoyosi Taiwo

2019-12-01

Unit 1 EdX Analytics Edge Notebook

This Notebook contains code from lessons and Assignments from EdX Analytics Edge MOOC. The class is thought in R and a R Notebook seemed like an appropriate way to document lessons and homeworks.

The notebook format also provides a quick source for referencing basic analytics methods in R.
